name: Stronger Together (Bit Studio)
description:
Walk throught this mysterious place, solve puzzles and stay close to each other. Remember - You're Not Alone!

You have under your control 3 characters, but each of them can move only if they are near each other. Don't let anyone be alone or else you'll lose control of lonely character.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with a theme "You're not alone"

CONTROLS:

Arrows - Move character

Q, W, E - Change the character

R (hold while playing level) - Restart Level

R (before the Mouse icon) - Reset your progress (Saved on your browser)

Thank you for reading this and (probably) playing it! :D
